item.title: I Made Something Happen
item.description:
I think Seth Godin might have been onto something with «Make something happen», so I did.

Today was my last day at EVRY. Some might already have been aware of this, mostly because of Hoff-Job-Announcement-as-a-Service, but also because of my own tweet as I left the EVRY offices in Bergen Â as an employee for the last time:
